00046 {
00047   typedef struct VertexIdMapKey {
00048     size_t glob_id;
00049     int proc_id;
00050   } VertexIdMapKey;
00051   
00052   struct VertexIdLessFunc {
00053     bool operator()( const VertexIdMapKey &that1, const VertexIdMapKey& that2 ) const
00054     {
00055       return ( (that1.proc_id < that2.proc_id) || ((that1.proc_id==that2.proc_id)&&(that1.glob_id<that2.glob_id)) );
00056     }
00057   };
00058   
00059   typedef std::map<VertexIdMapKey,int,VertexIdLessFunc> VertexIdMap;
00060

00062   int get_parallel_size();

00064   void parallel_barrier();
